channel.title: CVE Feed for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6890, MT7915, MT7916, MT7981, MT7986
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6890, MT7915, MT7916, MT7981, MT7986

item.title: CVE-2024-20017|2024-08-26T20:59:20.355Z -- mediatek%2C%20inc. -- mt6890%2C%20mt7915%2C%20mt7916%2C%20mt7981%2C%20mt7986
item.description: In wlan service, there is a possible out of bounds write due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation Patch ID: WCNCR00350938; Issue ID: MSV-1132.
